management_title: Channel Integration Manager for Car Rental Brokers and OTAs
management_desc: Increase your sales by integrating Turkey's leading and most powerful car rental company into your platform.
broker_desc: Quickly integrate your existing broker system and gain instant access to Turkey's entire vehicle fleet.
subagency_desc: Provide secure and fast access to your sub-agents and manage all bookings from a single platform.
fleet_desc: Manage, report, and improve the efficiency of your vehicle fleet from a single platform.
features_desc: Go Further with ZiraatFilo and Turkey’s Youngest Vehicle Fleet
features_list_1: The API connection allows you to access real-time pricing and available tools from brokers.
features_list_2: The detailed reporting system lets you monitor your data instantly from a single dashboard.
features_list_3: Enables fast communication with the sales team and real-time updates. You can manage requests, cancellations, and changes instantly.
features_list_4: Keeps you informed about seasonal promotions and campaign offers, playing a key role in boosting your sales.
about_list_1: Founded in 2001 to provide operational leasing services, ZiraatFİLO expanded its services in 2011 to include daily car rentals for individual customers in response to increasing consumer demand.
about_list_2: With the vision of offering a "brand-new car rental experience", the brand has made significant strides in a short period of time, continuing to grow rapidly and serve customers without compromising on quality through its ever-expanding service points and a fleet of 10,000 vehicles.
about_list_3: As of August 2019, Ziraat Filo Management and Mobility Solutions Inc. has been operating under the umbrella of Ziraat GSYO. Today, ZiraatFİLO serves its customers through 14 branches in 8 cities and continues its efforts to expand its service area and enhance customer satisfaction.
about_list_4: As Turkey’s first domestic daily car rental brand, ZiraatFİLO differentiates itself in the car rental sector with its friendly service approach, accessible pricing policy, strong vehicle fleet, and superior service quality.
popup_message_thanks: Thank you for contacting ZiraatFILO, Turkey's Leading Car Rental Company!
popup_message_asap: Our expert team will contact you as soon as possible.
